DOC.brief_title: Megestrol Acetate Treating Weight Loss Anorexia Young Patients With Malignancies Who Are Undergoing Radiation Therapy and/or Chemotherapy
DOC.detailed_description: PRIMARY OBJECTIVES : Proportion Patients Who Maintain Weight Experience Weight Gain . SECONDARY OBJECTIVES : BMI Trends , Caloric Intake , Weight Maintenance Over Time , Toxicity Profile Assessed NCI Common Toxicity Criteria Adverse Effects ( CTCAE ) v.4 . OUTLINE : Patients randomize 1 2 treatment arm . ARM A : Patients receive oral megestrol acetate 1-2 time ( 10 mg/kg dose daily 5 mg/kg dose twice daily ) daily 4 week . ARM B ( control ) : Patients observe weight loss gain 4 week . After completion study treatment , patient follow 12 week .
